question: Which state government has decided to provide free mobile phones to women of BPL families?
explanation: In a bid to boost Prime Minister Narendra Modi\'s flagship \'Digital India\' campaign, the Rajasthan government has decided to provide free mobile phones to women of  Below Poverty Line (BPL) families under the Bhamashah Yojana. The aim of the scheme is to transfer financial and non-financial benefits of government schemes in a transparent manner. The state government will also provide free Wifi facilities to as many as 5,000 gram panchayats to ensure that the state is well connected with the outside world. This programme commenced on September 1 and will end on September 30.
